verses.verse: Stand fast <WG4739> <WG5720> therefore <WG3767> in the liberty <WG1657> wherewith <WG3739> Moshiach <WG5547> hath made <WG1659> us <WG2248> free <WG1659> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> be <WG1758> not <WG3361> entangled <WG1758> <WG5744> again <WG3825> with the yoke <WG2218> of bondage <WG1397>.
